selectedVerses.text: for he had an only daughter, about twelve years of age, and she was dying.As Jesus went, the people pressed around him.
But some of them said, "Could not he who opened the eyes of the blind man also have kept this man from dying?"
Thus Joash the king did not remember the kindness that Jehoiada, Zechariah's father, had shown him, but killed his son. And when he was dying, he said, "May the LORD see and avenge!"
And Asa slept with his fathers, dying in the forty-first year of his reign.
From out of the city the dying groan, and the soul of the wounded cries for help; yet God charges no one with wrong.
